      • updateRules

        public void updateRules()

      • searchForRule

        public void searchForRule​(Puzzle puzzle,
                          java.lang.String ruleName)
        Search a certain rule in all the puzzles and set it for the searchBarPanel
        Parameters:
        puzzle - puzzle where the rule is being searched for
        ruleName - rule that is being compared to each puzzle This function is the searching algorithm for "public void setSearchBar(Puzzle allPuzzle)" (below) It takes two param Puzzle puzzle and String ruleName puzzle contains rules, this function will compare each rule of puzzle with ruleName, to find exact same, similar rules, or all the rules with same start letter (if input is a signal letter)

      • similarityCheck

        public static double similarityCheck​(java.lang.String s1,
                                     java.lang.String s2)
        Calculates the similarity (a number within 0 and 1) between two strings. This function will take two para String s1 and String s2, which s1 is the user's input and s2 is the compared really rule name
        Parameters:
        s1 - user's input
        s2 - the compared really rule name
        Returns:
        a similarity degree between 0 and 1 similarityCheck will use a helper function to calculate a similarity degree(from 0 to 1). closer to 0 means less similar, and closer to 1 means more similar.

      • editDistance

        public static int editDistance​(java.lang.String s1,
                               java.lang.String s2)
        Help function for similarityCheck();
        Parameters:
        s1 - user's input
        s2 - the compared really rule name
        Returns:
        a similarity degree between 0 and 1

      • setSearchBar

        public void setSearchBar​(Puzzle allPuzzle)
        Sets the search bar for SearchBarPanel search bar allows user to input a name to get relative rules once a name is entered and click ok will load (a/several) rule icon, which has all the functions just as other rule icons.
        Parameters:
        allPuzzle - name of rule input
